programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E16 Can't Run from Motorola
programme.desc: A suspect attempts to discard drugs during a foot chase. A man fails to pull over for minor infraction and then bails out his car on foot. A man is arrested after being spotted in a drug transaction.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E19 Make it a Large Soda
programme.desc: A motorcyclist refuses to stop for the police and later tries to escape on foot. A pedestrian is found to have a large soda cup full of anything but soda. A man calls for police help when he’s verbally attacked on a city bus.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Undercover officers organize a sting operation to catch drug users. A woman attempts to conceal drugs in her mouth during a routine search. A repeat offender is arrested after threatening offices.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer poses as a prostitute in an attempt to attract “johns”. A suspect flees on foot through the woods following an assault. An officer investigates a local bar known for illegal activity.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A stolen vehicle pursuit ends in a take down and recovery of additional evidence. A store employee flags down an officer who steps in to make a theft related arrest. An officer is accompanied by several units in pursuit of a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: Tom the Tow Truck
programme.desc: Poznaj Toma, wynalazcę z Samochodzikowa! W swoim nowoczesnym laboratorium tworzy wynalazki, aby rozwiązać problemy przyjaciół.

programme.title: Tom's Garage
programme.desc: Tom the Tow Truck pomaga swoim przyjaciołom z Car City, gdy ci potrzebują naprawy. Zawsze daje im coś specjalnego po każdej pracy.

programme.title: Tom's Paint Shop
programme.desc: Zatrzymaj się w warsztacie Toma Holownika! Ten kreatywny malarz z radością ulepszy i nada swoim przyjaciołom nowy, świeży wygląd.

programme.title: AnimaCars Discovery
programme.desc: Poznaj Jonny'ego Toolboxa i AnimaCars i dołącz do ich licznych misji ratunkowych, aby przywrócić spokój w Animatown!

programme.title: Carl the Super Truck
programme.desc: Carl Super Truck i jego transformacje na ratunek! Gdy Samochodzikowo potrzebuje pomocy, ten superbohater wkracza do akcji.

programme.title: Construction Squad
programme.desc: Zespół budowlany buduje Samochodzikowo cegła po cegle! Pokazują, że wszystko jest możliwe z pomocą naszych przyjaciół.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Odkryjmy liczby, litery, kolory i kształty poprzez zabawne i ekscytujące zadania na świeżym powietrzu z załogą AnimaCars!

programme.desc: 60 of the best feel-good summer hits! Each was a Top 10 smash across June, July & August in the '80s - on the beach, on your walkman, and at the Radio 1 Roadshow!

programme.title: Long Hot Summer!
programme.desc: All 80s - 24/7 - the feelgood pop decade where the Brits invaded the world!

programme.title: 1980s Glastonbury Headliners!
programme.desc: Back when the festival was much younger & much smaller, you might be surprised at some of the headliners! This is Glastonbury 1980s style - in order!

programme.title: We Do Reggae! Right?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 We Do Reggae! Right?
programme.desc: 60 minutes of summer hits & Caribbean beats - all from the 80s. Expect Aswad, UB40 & Bob Marley.

programme.title: 60 Summer Sizzlers! 1980-1989

programme.title: 1980s Glastonbury Headliners!

programme.title: Lisa Stansfield's Ladies of 80s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Lisa Stansfield's Ladies of 80s!
programme.desc: The UK's First Lady of soul selects her 20 favourite girls of the 80s. Expect Tracy Chapman, Grace Jones, Kate Bush & Whitney.

programme.title: Magic Moments! The 80s
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made the 80s!

programme.title: 25 Guilty Pleasures of the 80s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 25 Guilty Pleasures of the 80s!
programme.desc: You really know you shouldn't like them but no matter how much you try you always end up singing along! We've 25 songs which were so bad they're good coming up!

programme.title: Madonna! 80s v 90s
programme.desc: 32 massive videos from the Queen of Pop - one from the 80s followed by another from the 90s! Including 8 classic UK number 1s.

programme.title: Michael Jackson: 1980-1989
programme.desc: A troubled & damaged man but musically the decade belonged to him, with 2 of the biggest selling albums of all time and a string of big budget hit videos.

programme.title: The Complete Queen! 1973-1996
programme.desc: 24 years of rock classics from the biggest band of the era - Queen! From 73's Keep Yourself Alive to 96's Too Much Love Will Kill You - via a multitude of all-time rock anthems.

programme.title: 60 Summer Sizzlers! 1980-1989
programme.desc: 60 of the best feel-good summer hits! Each was a Top 10 smash across June, July & August in the '80s - on the beach, on your walkman, and at the Radio 1 Roadshow!

programme.title: Gary Davies: 25 Stadium Anthems!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Gary Davies: 25 Stadium Anthems!
programme.desc: Get the amps cranked up to 11 as Gary Davies is ready to rock with 2 hours of truly epic tracks! These are the 25 very best bands and artists that became 80s stadium superstars.

programme.title: 80s Rock Anthems Night!
programme.desc: Non-stop 80s rock & power ballads - all night! From Queen, Bon Jovi & Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, Bonnie Tyler & Tina Turner.

programme.title: 70s v 80s Rock Legends!
programme.desc: 30 hit songs, 15 top rock legends - one track as they were in the 70s, and another in the 80s - simple!

programme.title: 80s Rock Anthems Night!
programme.desc: Non-stop 80s rock & power ballads - all night! From Queen, Bon Jovi & Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, Bonnie Tyler & Tina Turner.

programme.title: Simon Bates 70s Pop! Top 50
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates 70s Pop! Top 50
programme.desc: Simon Bates with a celebration of a decade - the 50 biggest pure pop hits of the 70s. He's got a bucketload of Boney M, oodles of the Osmonds & an armful of Abba!

programme.title: Pauline Black Ska & Reggae Legends
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pauline Black Ska & Reggae Legends
programme.desc: The Selecter's lead singer with 25 innovators & trend-setters who made ska & reggae such an essential part of the 70s. From Desmond Dekker to Eddie Grant via Bob Marley & The Beat!

programme.title: Far Out, Man!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: Art School Cool! 1970-79
programme.desc: Art-school innovators, cool mavericks and risk-taking heroes all combine in this heady two-hour mix of stars who often pushed music way beyond the confines of chart-based pop.

programme.title: In The Summertime!
programme.desc: Feelgood sunshine hits from a colourful decade - the 1970s! Flares & mini-skirts at the ready?

programme.title: Chunks of Funk! 45 x 45s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Chunks of Funk! 45 x 45s!
programme.desc: 45 soulful tunes from the 70s - with laid-back ballads, funky pop and devastating disco. This is the decade in 4 hours!

programme.title: In The Summertime!

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Endearing host Tyrone Edwards surprises South African-born Shameen Miller with the results of her DNA test. Shameen cooks a meal that combines her two cultures and shares it with her family.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Host Tyrone Edwards shocks Andrea Titus with her DNA results. Blending her two cultures onto one plate, Andrea then cooks up a delicious and revealing meal for her family.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Host Tyrone Edwards reveals to Laird Hercules that his DNA includes other ancestry besides Guyanese. In the DNA Dinners kitchen, he cooks up a delicious meal that combines his known and newfound cultures.

programme.title: DNA Dinners
programme.desc: Mary Bosco is Italian, but Host Tyrone Edwards surprises her by revealing that her DNA test includes roots from other places. Mary cooks a special meal for her family that combines her two cultures.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.desc: Fa-what? Fa-waffles! Desiree Nielsen cooks up protein-rich falafel waffles for breakfast.

programme.title: The Wizard Of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Bucatini, Cornish Hen & Foie Gras, Souffle and Veal
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, sun-dried tomato bucatini! Next, Cornish hen, foie gras with waffles! Followed by a crab-shrimp souffle, and braised veal shoulder!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 India, Belgium, Italy, China
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by India - Bhindi Masala-Style Nopales, Belgium - Belgian Plantain Waffles, Italy - Almond Crusted Portobellos, and China - Sichuan Artichoke Stir Fry!

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: First up, Belgium is famous for its mussels and fries, aka 'Moule Frite'. Chef Wong has a unique take featuring Belgian beer steamed mussels salad, waffle cut fries, and potato-leek mousse. Next, Steak Madagascar is an old school fine-dining fave, this take, uses modernist 'spherification' for the sauce, and a vanilla bean rub for a steak that is decidedly not 'old school', wow! For a common ingredient, how about sweet breakfast? Belgians are famous for Liege Waffles, and Madagascar loves Mofogasy, a pancake made with rice flour and coconut. The final dish is inspired by Belgian Waterzooi, a root veggie stew, mixed with a popular Malagesy stir-fry with shellfish and pork... Chef carefully...

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of braised oxtail and plantain waffles, Turkish eggs with spiced yogurt, grilled broccolini, and plum parfait with gluten-free granola.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E18 Nuts about Walnuts, Pine Nuts and Pistachios
programme.desc: Nuts are a staple in Lebanon - they add depth of flavour and make dishes more hearty. Talented home cook Jasmin Ibrahim shows us a unique Lebanese dish that is traditionally made in the dead of winter - Winter Tabbouleh. With no fresh herbs or vegetables, this crunchy nut, feta, and tasty bulgur salad will get you through a long winter night. Next, she makes a simmering beef tortellini with toasted pine nuts in a hot, tangy yoghurt sauce. She then cooks up tender Celebration Lamb showered in three kinds of tasty nuts; it's great for sharing at special occasions. To finish off, Jasmin prepares some delicious walnut-filled Lebanese Pancakes doused in sweet rose water - yum! Ditch the...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E25 From the Island of Crete
programme.desc: Greek expert Joanna Chery showcases unique recipes from the island of Crete. To start, she whips up a creamy Cretan Meat Pie. Sweet ricotta, tender lamb, and an aromatic bundle of spices covered in a flaky Greek yoghurt pie dough might be the best Greek comfort food. Next, Joanna makes Grouper with Okra - a light and healthy dish featuring flaky sea bass, fresh okra, and delicious potatoes. Then, she prepares a dish that's traditionally served at weddings - Gamopilafo. It's a fluffy, citrusy, rice pilaf topped with crispy, juicy chicken that will have you going back for seconds! For dessert, a popular Cretan treat called Baklava. Joanna expertly layers crispy, golden-brown phyllo pastry...

programme.desc: Cook along with Shahir Massoud and Jasmin Ibrahim as they delve into all things anise! First, they get things rolling with an apple, fennel, and radish salad with a star anise spiked vinaigrette! Next up, Baked Mac and Cheese gets a duo of fennel: the vegetable and the seed! Finally, a pork tenderloin with a simple mixed berry sauce. Where's the fennel you ask? They rub the pork with fennel-cousin cumin for some smoky aroma and flavour! Remember"... a pinch of spice makes a world of difference!

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Low Carbs, No Problems
programme.desc: Host Desiree Nielsen shows us low-carb options for any meal of the day. Buckwheat pancakes smothered in blueberries? Yes, please!

programme.title: Blitz!
programme.desc: BLITZ! is an all-new cooking show! Imagine being next to Shahir Massoud as they cook their fav dishes!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Jasmin Ibrahim gives us the lowdown on her four favourite Lebanese dishes for a tasty meal. The best part? They all incorporate sweet and crunchy pomegranate! First, she makes a smoked eggplant dish - Baba Ghanouj. Then, she prepares a delicious Pastry with Pomegranate Sauce. These little half-moons, are filled with rich lamb, fresh mint, and toasted pine nuts, then paired with citrusy pomegranate molasses for a true balance of flavours. Next on the menu, Chicken with Pomegranate Sauce - a delightful blend of aromatic spices, sweet pomegranate molasses, and tender chicken breast. Enjoy with some fluffy rice and roasted vegetables for a delectable Sunday night dinner. Finally, Jasmin...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Joanna Chery elevates four Greek dishes using wine and spirits in this episode of One World Kitchen. First up, brown rice Stuffed Mussels infused with Greek dry white wine, tangy lemon juice, and fragrant spices - perfect for a sunny day by the sea. When evening rolls around, Joanna insists that red wine is a must! She makes a Sausage and Pepper Stew packed with golden-brown sausages and colourful bell peppers simmered in yummy tomatoes and a healthy dose of red wine. Then, she pulls out some brandy for a tender and delicious Beef Orzo Casserole. Finally, Joanna uses a traditional licorice-flavoured spirit called ouzo to bake a mouth-watering batch of Drunk Cookies.

programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Vietnam's Love for Noodles
programme.desc: Noodles are a staple in Vietnamese cooking and host Lisa Nguyen showcases their versatility by starting off with fine vermicelli Stuffed Squid. Beautifully grilled and charred, these squid make great finger food. Lisa sticks to stuffing with her next dish - a Vietnamese favourite, Spring Rolls. Crunchy on the outside and filled with soft glass noodles, juicy ground pork, tender shrimp, and delectable crab meat on the inside, you're sure to be salivating at the sight of these tasty creations. Next on the menu, a Crispy Egg Noodle Pillow with a medley of vegetables and sauces on top. Lisa then finishes with a fun seafood and tomato soup; make sure you try the yummy shrimp and delightful...

programme.desc: Desiree Nielsen adds more plants to her plate with two epic grilled cheese recipes that sneak in veggies.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.desc: Food nerd Desiree Nielsen knows how to add more veggies to our morning and shows us how it's done with a blueberry, celery, cucumber, and red cabbage juice.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Hong Kong Foodie Favourites
programme.desc: Cantonese expert Mary Tang showcases traditional dishes from the Chinese coastal territory, Hong Kong. To kick off the episode, Mary rolls up and steams a batch of fluffy Shrimp Dumplings. Next, tender beef with chewy rice noodles and fermented black beans is on the menu. This dish is doused in a fun and tasty dressing featuring salty soy sauce, tart Shaoxing wine, sweet oyster sauce, and a medley of spices. With a sturdy clay pot, Mary then cooks up some savoury Chinese sausage and lays it on a bed of aromatic rice. To top it off, why not some delicious Pineapple Buns? These buns are pillowy and sweet; you'll be surprised to hear that they contain zero pineapple!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Simple, fun, and magically tasty, some of Vietnam's most delicious and well-known foods come from its capital city of Hanoi. Vietnamese expert Lisa Nguyen shares her knowledge of Hanoi dishes by starting off with a sweet, sour, and spicy papaya salad called Goi Du Du. With a popular nuoc cham dressing featuring sugar, lime juice and Thai chili drizzled over a medley of crunchy carrots, fresh cilantro and mint, chewy papaya, and shrimp, this dish is the perfect balance of wonderful flavours and textures. Also on the menu, grilled-to-perfection Pork Patties with a rich caramel sauce. Fresh fragrant dill and golden turmeric elevate Lisa's next dish as she cooks up some mahi-mahi to enjoy...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E18 Nuts about Walnuts, Pine Nuts and Pistachios
programme.desc: Nuts are a staple in Lebanon - they add depth of flavour and make dishes more hearty. Talented home cook Jasmin Ibrahim shows us a unique Lebanese dish that is traditionally made in the dead of winter - Winter Tabbouleh. With no fresh herbs or vegetables, this crunchy nut, feta, and tasty bulgur salad will get you through a long winter night. Next, she makes a simmering beef tortellini with toasted pine nuts in a hot, tangy yoghurt sauce. She then cooks up tender Celebration Lamb showered in three kinds of tasty nuts; it's great for sharing at special occasions. To finish off, Jasmin prepares some delicious walnut-filled Lebanese Pancakes doused in sweet rose water - yum! Ditch the...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E25 From the Island of Crete
programme.desc: Greek expert Joanna Chery showcases unique recipes from the island of Crete. To start, she whips up a creamy Cretan Meat Pie. Sweet ricotta, tender lamb, and an aromatic bundle of spices covered in a flaky Greek yoghurt pie dough might be the best Greek comfort food. Next, Joanna makes Grouper with Okra - a light and healthy dish featuring flaky sea bass, fresh okra, and delicious potatoes. Then, she prepares a dish that's traditionally served at weddings - Gamopilafo. It's a fluffy, citrusy, rice pilaf topped with crispy, juicy chicken that will have you going back for seconds! For dessert, a popular Cretan treat called Baklava. Joanna expertly layers crispy, golden-brown phyllo pastry...

programme.desc: Motorsurf World Championship #1 - Fujairah (UAE) You’ve probably asked yourself many times what to do if you want to surf but the swell isn’t good enough. The athletes from the Motosurf World Championship have the answer. So let´s check out how they performed in Fujairah.

programme.title: Profile – Jakob Schubert & Highline Wendestein
programme.desc: Today we dive into the world of alpine sports. In the first part of the show, we look at the greatest achievements of the austian climber Jakob Schubert. Afterwards we turn to a high-wire act by highliner Lukas Irmler, who faces a special challenge in his home mountains

programme.title: Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 - Live delayed (Vert/Bowl/Street) Part 3
programme.desc: The Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 celebrates its 30th anniversary at the legendary Štvanice Island Skatepark. This international skateboarding event welcomes over 180 riders from all over the world to compete in the street, bowl and vert disciplines.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #04
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #05
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Rhythm of the Ocean
programme.desc: A captivating documentary that ventures beyond the waves, exploring the profound relationship between surfers and their environment. Through stunning visuals and personal anecdotes, the film paints a vivid portrait of the surfing lifestyle.

programme.title: 5 Peaks in One Day - Mountaineering
programme.desc: Zermatt, Switzerland - Swiss alpinist Andreas Steindl (26) has accomplished what most people deem impossible: he ran 30.66 kilometres from Zermatt to Saas Fee crossing five 4000m peaks. in only 7 hours, 45 minutes and 44 seconds.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Airton Cozzolino
programme.desc: We joined Airton Cozzolino, the 2023 World Champion, at his home in Cape Verde to see what goes on behind the life of a champion, and what the pressure of starting the first competition of the year at home truly feels like.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Season Wrap UpIn This weeks episode we take a look at the season wrap up of the European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023. Let´s check out Europes best wavesailors, competing at the bests spots on the Contoinent

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is looking forward to returning to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to open the 2024 season with the discipline of kite surfing. In February, the best kite-surfing athletes will compete against each other at the Kite-Surf World Cup

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #2 Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: The world's best freeriders compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The second stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 24th. The Andorran Pyrenees offers an amazing variety of terrain and venues that could host the competition.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Stop #03 CAN
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour has its 3rd stop. This takes place in Canada at Kicking Horse Golden BC, (CAN). It will be exciting to see how the Tour continues after the first two spectacular stopps!

programme.title: Natural Selection Tour 2022 - Jackson Hole, USA
programme.desc: The Natural Selection Tour 2022 features the world’s greatest men and women snowboarders competing on the planet’s most epic terrain in all-time conditions.

programme.title: Salomon Golden Trails - Series
programme.desc: Welcome to this week´s episode of World of Freesports. Today we travel to the Canary Islands – to El Hiero, Spain. We will be witnessing one of the hardest and most iconic trail running events in Europe – the Salomon Golden Trail.

programme.title: Mediterranean Epic 2022
programme.desc: 8Oropesa del Mar – Castellón (ESP), February 10th to 13th 2022It is the first big clash of the mountain bike season: a UCI Hors Catégorie 4-day stage race. The race offers spectacular mountain bike trails in close proximity to the sea!

programme.title: Faces of Valais - Teil 1
programme.desc: Valais is the third-biggest canton of Switzerland. It’s situated in the Southwest of Switzerland. We explored this stunning landscape for more than a year. The central element in our voyage though was water.

programme.title: Faces of Valais - Teil 2
programme.desc: Valais is the third-biggest canton of Switzerland. It’s situated in the Southwest of Switzerland. We explored this stunning landscape for more than a year. The central element in our voyage though was water.

programme.title: adidas Outdoor Sports Team - Bouldern & Climbing 2013
programme.desc: Highball bouldering in Switzerland’s Ticino and the redpoint ascent of the “Rote Wand” in /VorarlbergAustria. Beside adrenaline packed action this is also a story of trust and friendship as well as responsibility for yourself.

programme.title: adidas Outdoorsportsteam 2015 - Mountainsports: Climbing & Unicycling
programme.desc: Climbing on speed record in Yosemite Valley (USA) / Unicycling on the Damavand (IR) / Climbing at the Bürser Platte (Austria). Various athletes, different outdoor sports and unique stories - this combines the adidas Outdoorsportsteam.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 13, Jordan
programme.desc: Ten of the world’s strongest men gathered in Amman to compete in Jordan’s first-ever Truck-Pull Championship. The contestants race against the clock while pulling a 21-ton truck across the track. One of the most fierce competitors to take part in the event was four-time winner of the World’s Strongest Man competition, Brian Shaw.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 14, Greece
programme.desc: Taking place in Corinth, Greece, considered by many the cradle of the sports competition games, an epic strongman battle will mark the last stage before the upcoming big two-day season’s finale in Chetumal, Mexico. In front of more than 5000 spectators, the twelve athletes compete in Log Lifts, Card Deadlift, Conan’s Wheel and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 15, Mexico World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first day of the two-part finale sees the strongest men competing in Carry and Drag, Dumbbell Lift and the Truck Pull. Everything is possible in this heated fight for the crown against the backdrop of stunning Chetumal, Mexico.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter, competing in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, 3 in this second episode; a Viking-press of 150 kg with the current world record holder Luke Herrick. The fifth event, a front hold of 25 kg is loved or hated by the athletes and lastly, the Stones of Strength.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 6, Russia
programme.desc: An unbelievable TANK PULL of 50.000 kg was at the stage of SCL RUSSIA. Never seen this before! Not only a tank pull was done here but also the Viking Press/ Deadlift Max and Log lift reps were spectacular events to see here in Russia. With Mikhail Koklyaev also as event presenter, the former top 3 world strongest man from Russia was there

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: In this year’s edition on The Balkan Peninsula, we have competing the new talent from Estonia Marko Remlik together with Sebastian Kurek from Poland and yellow leader Kelvin de Ruiter

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland and Aivars Smaukstelis from Latvia are the strongman future of these days. Mateusz is the best man in the World at the moment to defeat. Only 25 years and such a fantastic strongman. They come here only for a win. But there are 12 more Strong athletes in this episode who want the title of Finland as well.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Mateusz Is leading after day 1 (previous episode) with close behind him Aivars Smaukstelis and Zake Muluzi from the UK. All very exciting! 5 events in this episode: Log Lift, Fram Walk, Deadlift, Sack Throw (Weight for Height), Loading medley.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 10, Portugal
programme.desc: In this stage we have a new strong debutant: Oleg Sylka from the Ukraine. He is the new talent, who will stand up against the old champions like ZSydrunas Savickas and Brian Shaw and the Stoltman Brother from the UK. This new talent Oleg is a great character and we will see him flame in the episode in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 11, Callio
programme.desc: In Callio is the deepest mine of Europe/ 1500 meter deep, whereas the MLO Strongman Champions League also did 1 event. The Forward Hold, on a 1500 dept/ also a kind of new record/ as it was never done before. Spectacular and new in Strongman sport.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 12, Ukraine
programme.desc: Kelvin de Ruiter is here to defend his SCL World Truck Pull Championships title. But this year, another strong field wants his title. Over 3 different pulls with 3 different trucks, and 14 athletes at the start, it will be difficult for everybody.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E13 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 13, Caribbean
programme.desc: SCL edition Curacao 2019 was a great event, twelve power boys from all over made a great show at the white beaches, and 35 degrees Celsius heat in the Carrabean Islands. Two events were held on Friday at the beach of beautiful resort Sunscape, the other three were held near the world famous floating bridge at Willemstad on Saturday night.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E14 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 14, Dubai
programme.desc: Hosted at Meydan Grandstand in Dubai, the Strongman Champions League had some really big names in the list like Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland, Brian Shaw from the USA and Krzysztof Radzikowski. In front of the Burj Khalifa the athletes do the deadlift max and 4 other heavy events at another spot in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E15 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. The last stage over 2 episodes of the MLO Strongman Champions League, were held in Porto, Portugal. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E16 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results and this is the final!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: The spectacular Fefor Arena hosted for the 8th time the Worlds Strongest Viking, part of the SCL World Series. But with the absence of former title holders its anyones game. Again, a very spectacular episode of the Strongman Champions League here in Norway.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 2, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: In this episode, the Titan, former double World champion from Latvia will compete against his fellow countryman and the current World champion - Aivars Smaukstelis. With 8 events over 2 stages the contestants are pushed to their limits in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 3, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Dainis Zageris and Aivars Smaukstelis, both from Latvia have a serious, strong battle in the this second and final episode of the SCL Finland 2020. Watch the unbelievable and brute power of these athletes in the last 4 events to crown the winner.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 4, World Record Breakers
programme.desc: The SCL Germany event takes place in an ancient castle called Die Burg in the heart of Germany. Its here where 5 world record attempts take place across 5 different events with 10 athletes. They will go to the max! See this and much more in the SCL Germany 2020.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 5, Strongest Viking
programme.desc: SCL Norway is normally all about snow, wind, and cold weather. Our brave athletes are used to compete under conditions few other athletes have competed in, but after COVID delays the competition has been moved from winter to summer bringing in a whole new range of challenges. With an impressive athlete list who will be the winner across 5 cruel events?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 6, World Strongest Team 1
programme.desc: Were in sunny Finland for the next stage of a double-bill of SCL action, but this time its a team event. A truly fantastic event with 6000 spectators. Even during COVID times this was exceptional! 8 Strong Teams where fighting for the title over a crazy 9 events.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 7, World Strongest Team 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland, done over 9 cruel events. In this episode the last and final 5 events take place. 8 Strong Teams are fighting for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 8, Portugal
programme.desc: The next set of challenges are set in sunny Esposende in Portugal. With stars such as Travis Ortmayer, Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland, and Ervin Toots from Estonia. While Fabio Silva will defend the honour in his own country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E09 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 9, World Records (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are back in Germany, with the world record breakers. We promise you this is going to be amazing. Do not move from that seat, because we are going to see some records smashed today. Over 6 cruel events, you will see who gets crowned of the King Of The Castle!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E10 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 10, World Records (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the next episode of Strongman Champions League Germany. Its the world record breakers, and in the last show we set two new records. Can more be records be broken before the king of the castle is crowned?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E11 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 11, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 1)
programme.desc: Welcome to Kokkola in Finland. This city will be the setting for the Lightweight World championship. Out of 24 athletes, only 16 will make it through to the final day, but who will champion each event and who is going to be eliminated?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E12 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 12, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 2)
programme.desc: Its the second day, and the top 16 athletes have made it through to the final round. With another 4 events to go who will get the crown of world champion?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E13 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 13, Ukraine
programme.desc: Welcome to Ukraine and the wonderful capital city of Kyiv. Were here for the second time for the iconic truck pull World Championships! The reigning World champion Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland will defend his title.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E10 GLORY 97 Featherweight Grand Prix
programme.desc: Eight of the best and most exciting featherweights on the planet go head-to-head in a one-night tournament. GLORY featherweight champion Petch (170-40-3, 27 KO) goes up against former RISE champion Taiju Shiratori (30-10-1, 12 KO), the in-form Berjan Peposhi (30-4, 16 KO) takes on ‘The Korean Monster’ Sunghyun Lee (69-11-2, 17 KO), the always exciting Abraham Vidales (16-3, 13 KO) collides with current RISE champ Chadd Collins (63-17-2, 32 KO), and number one ranked GLORY featherweight Miguel Trindade (59-6, 24 KO) faces RISE great & former GLORY title contender Kento Haraguchi (26-4-1, 17 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A Champ vs. Champ superfight takes place in the main event as GLORY welterweight world champion Chico Kwasi (43-5, 23 KO) puts his title on the line against GLORY lightweight world champ Tyjani Beztati (27-4, 9 KO). In the co-main event, Donovan Wisse (21-1, 10 KO) aims to defend his GLORY middleweight world championship for a fifth time when he welcomes the challenge of top German Sergej Braun (44-13, 27 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A five-round heavyweight title eliminator between the number one ranked contender Levi Rigters (18-2, 8 KO) and ‘The Golden Wolf’ Bahram Rajabzadeh (69-3, 61 KO). The winner will face ‘The King of Kickboxing’ Rico Verhoeven (64-10, 21 KO) on December 7 in the main event of COLLISION 7. In the co-main event of the evening, Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (25-4-1, 13 KO) clashes with Nico ‘Big Sexy’ Horta (23-9, 3 KO) in a monster heavyweight clash with big implication for the rankings. Croatian kickboxing legend Mladen Brestovac (55-14-1, 37 KO) will make his final walk to the ring in his hometown of Zagreb. ‘The Scorpion Sting’ will take on newcomer Karim Dian (16-13, 3 KO) to cap off an illustrious...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E10 GLORY 97 Featherweight Grand Prix
programme.desc: Eight of the best and most exciting featherweights on the planet go head-to-head in a one-night tournament. GLORY featherweight champion Petch (170-40-3, 27 KO) goes up against former RISE champion Taiju Shiratori (30-10-1, 12 KO), the in-form Berjan Peposhi (30-4, 16 KO) takes on ‘The Korean Monster’ Sunghyun Lee (69-11-2, 17 KO), the always exciting Abraham Vidales (16-3, 13 KO) collides with current RISE champ Chadd Collins (63-17-2, 32 KO), and number one ranked GLORY featherweight Miguel Trindade (59-6, 24 KO) faces RISE great & former GLORY title contender Kento Haraguchi (26-4-1, 17 KO).

In the co-main event, Donovan Wisse (21-1, 10 KO) aims to defend his GLORY middleweight world championship for a fifth time when he welcomes the challenge of top German Sergej Braun (44-13, 27 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The main event will see two of the light heavyweight division’s most explosive young prospects clash as Romania’s Stefan Latescu (17-3, 8 KO) faces Turkey’s Cem Caceres (16-1, 13 KO). Belgium based Albanian Berjan Peposhi (29-4, 16 KO) will compete in the co-main event. The always exciting featherweight welcomes rising star Ayoub Bourass (14-1, 4 KO) in to make his GLORY debut. International Muay Thai superstar Youssef Boughanem (188-43-8, 120 KO) returns for his sophomore GLORY outing against tough Italian Angelo Volpe (38-5, 12 KO). Former middleweight title contender Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-10, 36 KO) takes on Antwerp’s own Jente Nnamadim (21-5, 11 KO), who comes in to make his GLORY...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The welterweight superfight between former GLORY world champion Endy Semeleer (36-2, 18 KO) and current GLORY lightweight world champion Tyjani Beztati (26-4, 9 KO) will take center stage in the main event of the evening. After dominating the lightweight division, Beztati moves up to welterweight for the very first time in his GLORY career. GLORY featherweight world champion Petch (169-40-3, 27 KO) and RISE national champion Kento Haraguchi (25-3-1, 14 KO) made their trilogy fight official for the co-main event. programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E04 GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: The eight-man one-night GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix will crown the baddest light heavyweight striker on the planet. The eight participants are: GLORY champion, #C Tarik Khbabez (58-10-1, 28 KO), Morocco. Former champion, #1 Donegi Abena (27-10, 7 KO), Suriname. Former champion, #2 Sergej Maslobojev (38-6, 23 KO), Lithuania. Undefeated in GLORY, #3 Stefan Latescu (17-2, 8 KO), Romania. ‘Mister Cool’ #4 Ibrahim El Bouni (41-9-1, 22 KO), Morocco. The wild & unpredictable, #5 Bahram Rajabzadeh (67-2, 59 KO), Azerbaijan. Top French light heavyweight, #6 Pascal Toure (20-6, 7 KO), France. Veteran fighter, #7 Bogdan Stoica (58-14, 40 KO), Romania.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Donovan Wisse (20-1, 10 KO) puts his middleweight championship on the line against number one contender Ulric Bokeme (32-4, 17 KO) in the main event of the evening. Wisse is one of the top P4P kickboxers on the planet today and is chasing his fourth straight title defense. After his Grand Prix heroics, the number one ranked heavyweight Levi Rigters (17-2, 8 KO) returns to action to take on dangerous late notice replacement Nico Pereira Horta (22-8, 3 KO) in the co-main event. The ‘King of The Hague’ crown is up for grabs when rivals Michael Boapeah (16-4-1, 7 KO) and Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-9, 36 KO) clash. The two top middleweights meet in this local derby match-up where the winner walks...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The GLORY welterweight title will be on the line in the main event as the reigning & defending champion Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) welcomes the challenge of top contender Chico Kwasi (42-5, 22 KO). In the co-main event, after his crazy GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix performance, the wild & exciting Bahram Rajabzadeh (66-2, 58 KO) steps down to light heavyweight and meets the hard-hitting Paris-based Kevin Oumar (33-4, 7 KO), a French kickboxing champion & budding MMA star. Belgian-Moroccan superstar Youssef Boughanem (187-43-8, 119 KO) steps into the GLORY ring for the very first time in his illustrious career as he meets the Ukraine’s Stanislav Kazantsev (25-8-1, 7 KO). The best of French...

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: In a showdown between the winners from Series 1 and the powerhouse Russian Red Devils, Mario Rinaldi is in tough against Sergey Kaznovski. The Russian is reknowned for short, brutal fights, earning him a reputation as the king of the 1st round KO. This is not the first time Trevor Pragley and Andrei Semenov have met in the ring. Last time, Semenov was battered into submission, so he come into this fight hungry for revenge.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Tara LaRosa is a former student of all-world fighter Royce Gracie. She takes on perhaps the only woman who has a fighting chance to put the hurt on her...Amanda Buckner.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: This is heavyweight fighting at its best and bloodiest. Finnish muay thai champion Jarno Nurminen makes his mised martial art debut against Korean judo expert Sag Su Lee. And in one of the sport's best brawls, Roy Nelson goes toe-to-toe with Josh Curran.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Jesse Arnett attributes most of his success to his coaches, in particular Jake Peacock. Jake was born with only a partial arm. This coach and fighter doesn't let that stop him from training some of the best athletes in the world.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Mike Short comes from a history of street fighting and recognizes the importance of training and discipline. He has been coaching Boxing for many years and relishes the fact that his entire family comes together at his events, run out of Dekada Gym.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Craig Wilson as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Ukraine born Anton Tokarchuck is known for his massive knock outs. At HK35, he takes on Jesse Day Rider - a fighter who has never been knocked out. Anton has worked incredibly hard at the gym for this and is looking to continue his knock out winning streak.

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Coming from a history of drinking heavily and drug abuse, Nick Burnham was able to turn his life around completely by prioritizing his MMA training. Now, at HK38, Nick is looking to take the Lightweight title away from Dauda Keita in a fight that goes the distance!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Chael Sonnen has trained with Team Quest, alongside fighters like Matt Lindland and Randy Couture. Tim Credeur has kept busy fighting on the US navy jiu-jitsu and judo teams, and making some cash in bullpen fights in Tijuana.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: In a showdown between the winners from Series 1 and the powerhouse Russian Red Devils, Mario Rinaldi is in tough against Sergey Kaznovski. The Russian is reknowned for short, brutal fights, earning him a reputation as the king of the 1st round KO. This is not the first time Trevor Pragley and Andrei Semenov have met in the ring. Last time, Semenov was battered into submission, so he come into this fight hungry for revenge.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: MMA Veteran Nick Thompson goes up against the brute force of wrestling star Davion Peterson. Thompson has more pro fight experience than anyone on the first series, and will need all of it to hold his own against the relentless Peterson.

programme.desc: See how a current fighter balances his own training and UFC aspirations with his life as a coach, trying to help others pursue their fight dreams. We follow Hard Knocks fighter Keegan Oliver through a day in his life as a Coach.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E253 This is Fate S1 E253
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E253 Undercover Love S1 E253
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E7
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E253 King of Hearts S1 E253
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E253 Second Chances S1 E253
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E47 Jodha Akbar S3 E47
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E254 This is Fate S1 E254
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.sub-title: S01 : E254 Undercover Love S1 E254
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.sub-title: S2023 : E03 Fiserv Forum - Milwaukee, WI
programme.desc: Grave Digger’s Weston Anderson brings the Arena Championship Series East points lead to the Fiserv Forum in Milwaukee. programme.sub-title: S2024 : E07 NRG Stadium - Houston, TX
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East returns to Houston for another carnage-filled round on some of the slickest dirt in the sport.
